body.name: KIDEE Portable Clip on Fan, Small Desk Fan Battery Operated, 360° Rotation, Utral Quiet, 3 Speed, Mini Table Fan Rechargeable, Personal Cooling Baby Stroller Fan for Home Office Outdoor Travel
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 30 mins
features: ❥【3 POWERFUL WIND SPEEDS & LOW NOISE】 With 3 adjustable speed settings, KIDEE portable fan delivers powerful airflow while operating at a whisper-quiet level. Perfect as a clip fan for bed, the mini fan ensures undisturbed rest.
❥【3-IN-1 MULTIFUNCTIONAL FAN】 Seamlessly transitioning between a clip-on fan, table fan, and hanging fan, this versatile personal fan adapts to your different cooling needs.

❥【360° ROTATION】 360° vertical and horizontal adjustment design, KIDEE small fan allows you to effortlessly adjust the airflow direction, ensuring consistent, all-around cooling for your personal space.

❥【2000mAh BATTERY & UP TO 8H WORKING TIME】 Equipped with a 2000mAh rechargeable battery, this desk fan offers up to 8 hours of running time after fully recharged within 3 hours, Say goodbye to frequent battery replacements.

❥【PORTABLE & LIGHTWEIGHT】 Compact and lightweight, the baby fan is designed for effortless portability. Whether at home or on a camping trip, the bed fan can be easily carried around with its convenient design.

How long can the battery last with a full charge ? KIDEE clip on fan is equipped with 2000mah battery and requires approximately 3 hours to fully charge. providing 3-8 hours running time depending on the usage settings. Can the clip fan wind speed be adjusted? Yes, KIDEE portable fan offers 3 adjustable wind speeds to meet your different nee What is the charging method for the small fan ? KIDEE mini fan utilizes a convenient usb charging method (5v/1a type c), providing flexibility and ease of charging through various usb-compatible devices. Is the personal fan adjustable? yes, KIDEE baby stroller fan is equipped with a 360° rotation capability, allowing you to adjust the direction and angle of the fan freely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Portable Fan
reviews.reviewText: The Portable Clip-on Fan has been a lifesaver, especially during hot summer days or when I'm on the go with my baby stroller. Its compact size and clip-on design make it incredibly versatile and convenient to use. I can easily attach it to the stroller, providing instant cooling for my little one without taking up precious space.Despite its small size, this fan packs a punch with its 360° rotation and three-speed settings. Whether I need a gentle breeze or a more powerful airflow, this fan delivers. Plus, it operates ultra-quietly, ensuring that it doesn't disturb my baby's sleep or peaceful stroll.The rechargeable battery feature is another plus, allowing me to use the fan without worrying about running out of power. It's also handy for travel or outdoor adventures where access to power outlets may be limited.Overall, I highly recommend this Portable Clip-on Fan to any parent looking for a convenient and effective way to keep their baby cool and comfortable while on the go. It's a game-changer for hot summer days and outdoor outings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very simple little fan.
reviews.reviewText: I have a fan similar to these, so I thought I would check this one out, since it's much smaller. Glad I did. When you camp as much as I do, you can deal with pretty much anything but... When you're cold, you can add a blanket or three, but when you're feeling overheated after you've gotten into the shade, standing in a breeze, but no cool water to jump into, there's not much you can do besides suffer. This little fan is a big help. This one is small enough to put almost anywhere, it has an aligateroid clip to attach it to something in your tent, and a loop to hang it up prop it up, so you can put it almost anywhere. And it's powerful enough to cover a much larger area than you think. I can see stretching out for a nap on a hot afternoon, and angling it to cover my entire body. Very good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Powerful and compact
reviews.reviewText: I got several of these fans to use while working out at the gym and overall these fans work well. They have a very small footprint and charge pretty quickly. They are very portable and compact in size and the battery lasts well beyond my normal 2 hour workouts. I like that I can clip the fan to the treadmill or elliptical machine and the clip rotates 360 degrees or I can also easily slip it into my pocket while I move between weight machines. It also has a flat base so you can place and position it however you want on any flat surface. My only criticism is that the spring clip is a little small so you will be limited in what it can be clipped to. Also the stream of air that this fan produces is pretty narrow due to its small size. Overall I like the fan but I wish it had slightly larger fan blades to produce a wider path of air but other than that I am quite happy with it. It should also come in very handy while travelling and on vacation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and powerful
reviews.reviewText: This clip on fan is very small and powerful. I like that I can charge it and use it anywhere I want, it have 3 settings you just need to press on the button once or twice or three times in order to change the settings.I didn’t like the clip because it was very hard to press it or clip it on anything but I liked that I can just put it to stand on any surface.Pretty good fan for the size and it’s also very quiet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clip on Fan
reviews.reviewText: Impressive little fan. Don't find the ears really necessary, but this little guy has some power compared to other fans its size. I sleep with a fan blowing on me so I am always changing out fans. Many are larger and take up a lot of space. It is much nicer to fine a smaller fan with more power and this one can compete.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This tiny fan packs a punch!
reviews.reviewText: This tiny fan is both cute and strong. It has three speeds and the top one is quite impressive. I like the clip, and it's quiet even on the highest setting. I clipped it on my treadmill for extra breeziness, and it worked like a charm. This would also be perfect at my work desk.
